name: White Knight Chronicles II
description:
*Online server will be shut down on 6/18/13.
White Knight Chronicles™ II is an epic high production RPG with stunning visuals and over 30 hours of original gameplay. This follow up to the original White Knight Chronicles includes new features and the return of its signature combination of single and multiplayer role playing. Experience the thrilling finale and awaken to your true calling as you unlock the true powers of the Incorruptus, a giant powerful knight from the ancient Dogma wars.
